org.cleverbus.api.entity Main (business) entities.

org.cleverbus.api.exception  
org.cleverbus.api.extcall  
org.cleverbus.api.file Handle file storing in the repository.
org.cleverbus.api.route Defines base class for route definition and few basic routes.
org.cleverbus.common  
org.cleverbus.common.jaxb JAXB enhancements - date conversion to/from JODA time.
org.cleverbus.common.log Enhancements to logging capabilities.
org.cleverbus.component Custom Camel components.
org.cleverbus.component.asynchchild "asynch-child" Camel component.
org.cleverbus.component.externalcall "extcall" component implementation.
org.cleverbus.component.funnel "msg-funnel" component implementation.
org.cleverbus.component.throttling "throttling" component for throttling input requests.
org.cleverbus.core.alerts Alerts implementation.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch Processing of asynchronous messages.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.confirm Confirmation functionality.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.msg Message services and operations with them.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.notification Notification service - useful when is needed to contact (inform) selected people.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.queue Re-processing of PARTLY_FAILED messages.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.repair Repair processing messages and external calls.
org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.stop Classes for "ESB stopping" functionality.
org.cleverbus.core.common.contextcall Classes for making calls between sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context.
org.cleverbus.core.common.dao DAO classes.
org.cleverbus.core.common.directcall Classes for making direct calls to external systems via sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context and then to external system.
org.cleverbus.core.common.event Defines CleverBus events.
org.cleverbus.core.common.exception Defines exceptions hierarchy and defines global error handling policy.
org.cleverbus.core.common.extension CleverBus extension classes.
org.cleverbus.core.common.file Handle file storing in the repository.
org.cleverbus.core.common.route Defines base class for route definition and few basic routes.
org.cleverbus.core.common.spring Support classes for Spring "context:component-scan" include/exclude elements.
org.cleverbus.core.common.validator  
org.cleverbus.core.common.version Classes for extracting build number from MANIFEST.MF file.
org.cleverbus.core.common.version.comparator  
org.cleverbus.core.common.version.impl  
org.cleverbus.core.common.ws Helper classes for Spring Web Services.
org.cleverbus.core.common.ws.component Standard Camel Spring WS component returns raw exception when invalid XML request occurs.
org.cleverbus.core.common.ws.transport.http  
org.cleverbus.core.common.ws.transport.http.ntlm NTLM extension of HttpClient.
org.cleverbus.core.conf Application configuration classes.
org.cleverbus.core.monitoring Monitoring tools.
org.cleverbus.core.reqres Requests/responses saving.
org.cleverbus.core.throttling Throttling problem solution.
org.cleverbus.modules Modules encapsulates various interfaces to external systems - each module represents one input/output interface of the integration platform.
org.cleverbus.modules.in Modules which process input requests from external systems - public interfaces are divided by entity type + there is special interface for communication with Vodafone (VF), to be able to send messages to our system.
org.cleverbus.modules.in.hello Hello world example.
org.cleverbus.modules.out Modules which serves for requesting third party systems (billing, vodafone, ...).
